Name: HMS Southampton
Propulsion:
Four-shaft Parsons geared turbines
Four Admiralty 3-drum boilers
75,000 shp
Armament:
12 × BL 6-inch (152 mm) guns [triple mounts]
8 × QF 4-inch (102 mm) guns [double mounts]
4 × 3-pounder
8 x QF 2-pounder (40 mm) AA guns [quadruple mounts]
6 × 21-inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
